Myrmidon frowned as Malice spoke. For a moment Myrmidon felt a flicker of r=
espect for Malice, but then as he only ended with vague threats and his fac=
e assumed a new configuration, the flicker of respect died.

"We will deal =
with Unicron soon enough, but unless you have something to give us, I am sa=
tisfied with you here behind this force shield."

Myrmidon glanced at Perce=
ptor, "He is locked behind a force shield. Guard him while I go to help in =
he battle."

Preston 
(Myrmidon)
